title: Disconnecting from client after game
body: I have no idea why, but every time that i finish a game it just disconnects from the client, dropping the internet connection only for my client even though its fine at the moment. This only started today, never happened before and has happened for all the games I've played so far, it just appears at the "skip for waiting" and then soon will disconnect and eventually forced to close.

replies.body: It sounds like something is breaking off the connection between your network and our server.  The first step is to rule out any connection issues by going through the [Connection Troubleshoot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  If you still experience the issue, please reach out to our tech team who can look into this further by[ submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)  Hope that helps!
